My husband has MRSA and we've discovered that if we cover the area with a cotton ball soaked in castor oil over night when he feels the first twinge from a pending outbreak, the soar never materializes and goes completely away within 24 hours. We also strongly increased the alkalinity of food and drink that he intakes to help keep the disease at bay. We're so very happy to report that using these two tactics has kept him outbreak for over two years!!!
Geez man. Can't share this stuff so early in the day. God bless that little boy and everyone that was around him.

I am convinced that the Clintons look out across this land of ours and insofar as they are concerned they see nothing other than what they think are rubes, rednecks and buffoons that they can lie to, cheat and con. I suspect they privately laugh to themselves about how easily people are fooled and I suspect that even the Clintons are surprised about what they have gotten by with.
